issue.title: [CF 1204] How to track Lifebloom on 2 different targets with 4 pice HFC Druid Tier set
issue.body:
Hi.. I am a Resto Druid with the 4 Piece T18 set.  I am trying to track my 2 lifeblooms expirations on different targets since I can put 2 lifeblooms simultaneously on different targets.  I want my voice-over sound notification to fire off on Finish of the 1st lifebloom and at the same time on finish of the second lifebloom so I know when to reapply it.... How do I go about that? I am not very experienced with the addon.. Thanks


> Posted by CurseForge user Darlok9 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1204 | Raw

comments.body:
Already responded on Curse.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
